required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Anlotinib Neoadjuvant Treatment in Locally Advanced Thyroid Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Anlotinib in Neoadjuvant Treatment in Locally Advanced Thyroid Cancer: a Single-arm Phase II Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the efficacy and safety of Anlotinib in patients of locally advanced thyroid cancer in the neoadjuvant setting.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at the time point of 18 weeks

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the time point of 18 weeks
from the first drug administration to within 90 days after surgery

intervention.description: All patients will receive Anlotinib for at least two cycles of neoadjuvant treatment
Perform surgery if operable after neoadjuvant therapy
Perform core needle biopsy if inoperable after neoadjuvant therapy
